pageContext.title: Class 1 Digital and Power Repair
pageContext.description: Check out what is included in this repair service.
pageContext.data:
What is Class 1 Digital and Power Repair?


Class 1 Hearing Aid Digital and Power Repair includes the repair or replacement of any of these electronic components while maintaining the "original" hearing aid settings:
  • Hearing aid shell
  • transducer: microphones which receive sound waves
  • peaker: a receiver which processes sound
  • capacitors
  • resistors
  • amplifier
  • copper wiring

Warranty is provided for all components and labor, regardless of whether they were functioning according to specification at the time of the initial repair and were not the cause for the original failure.
